extension.config.taskPresentationOptions: Terminal options for running a task
Controls whether the Integrated Terminal panel is brought to front
Controls whether the terminal is taking input focus or not
Controls whether the executed command is echoed in the terminal
Controls whether to show the "Terminal will be reused by tasks, press any key to close it" message
Controls whether the terminal instance is shared between task runs
Controls whether the terminal is cleared before this task is run
